text.content: Due to institute policy, minors (under 18) that are not students at Georgia Tech may not attend HackGT.

For more information on the application process, please click [here](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1fhBZNRLnbBucnAyHCJhgcvhsyrkx4QMd9WRfBqYT6Qs/edit?usp=drive_web&ouid=113711619683399493560). 

 Please see the [Travel Reimbursement Policy](https://docs.google.com/document/d/16uJuzuqMogFSOeEGRqUYLwGUmsy6NpeNMEQ7DzCtJ2g/edit?usp=sharing) for details on reimbursement amounts. Busses will be sent to schools that have a large volume of applicants, but please select your preferred reimbursement in the case that no bus is sent to your school.

questions.name: other
questions.label: Anything else you want us to know?

text.content: Please be advised that travel reimbursement is not available for volunteers or mentors.
We have two types of volunteering positions you may apply for: Core Volunteers and General Volunteers.

Responsibilities may include being assigned to a major role during the event, leading other volunteers, providing communication between teams of volunteers, other volunteer leaders, and organizers, and will require more time commitment- including attending a training session prior to the event and being present at the event for an extended period of time.

Responsibilities may include venue setup/teardown, working the Registration desk, food setup/clean up, working the Help and Hardware desk. The time commitment includes attending a training session prior to event and being present during peak hours.

text.content: Note that opening ceremonies will begin at approximately 6:30pm on Friday, October 19th and closing ceremonies will end at approximately 3:30pm on Sunday, October 21st
Please upload your flight / rail receipt below
(**Note**: We will not accept receipts submitted after **Wednesday, August 29th** at 11:59pm EDT)
Please confirm some things for us

text.content: Note that opening ceremonies will begin at approximately 6:30pm on Friday, October 19th and closing ceremonies will end at approximately 3:30pm on Sunday, October 21st
Please upload a PDF print-out of your planned Google Maps route with milage

**Note**: Only the driver should upload a receipt. We are reimbursing at a rate of 12 cents/mile based on your location with incentives for carpooling. See our [Travel Reimbursement Policy](https://docs.google.com/document/d/16uJuzuqMogFSOeEGRqUYLwGUmsy6NpeNMEQ7DzCtJ2g/view) for more details.
